special_text:
Xiv, Replisparked has all abilities of creature and planeswalker cards integrated onto them.
[+2]: Target player discards a card. Integrate up to two cards from graveyards. [i](Exile them, then you may choose nonland permanents they’re integrated onto.)[/i]
[+1]: Xiv becomes a 5/5 artifact creature with vigilance and indestructible until end of turn. [i](It doesn’t lose loyalty while not a planeswalker.)[/i]
[-4]: Integrate target permanent.
notes:
!canoncard Karn Liberated
 101: Integrating is now optional.
